	\begin{enumerate}


		\item Number one



		\item Two



		\item Three

		\begin{enumerate}


			\item Indent


		\end{enumerate}
	\end{enumerate}

		\item List

		\begin{itemize}


			\item Indentatio


		\end{itemize}

		\item Continuing



		\item Previous



		\item List

		\begin{enumerate}


			\item Indenting 4


		\end{enumerate}
	\end{enumerate}
	\begin{enumerate}


		\item Going down to b

		\begin{enumerate}


			\item Indenting 1


		\end{enumerate}

		\item Going back to c


	\end{enumerate}
	\begin{enumerate}


		\item Immediately starting other list


	\end{enumerate}
	\begin{itemize}
